item.description:
Please watch the NH Ruby site for more information

http://wiki.nhruby.or...

The NH Ruby and Rails User Group will hold its 2008 meeting at the usual spot, RMC Research in Portsmouth.

WHEN: Our next meeting will be held on Tuesday, July 15, 2008, from 7-9 PM.

WHERE: It will be held at the offices of RMC Research in Portsmouth, NH. 1000 Market Street.

WHAT: Jeremy Durham will be discussing the Merb web development framework. Merb is written in Ruby and is considered a promising modular, performance-oriented alternative to Rails. Jeremy will be discussing his journey converting an existing Ruby on Rails application to Merb, the challenges of using Merb, and when it may make sense to use it.

RSVP now: http://wiki.nhruby.or...

group.name: The NH Ruby and Rails Meetup

item.name: The Seacoast NH Ruby and Rails July Meetup
